description: Dore ibiganiro tuzumva muri iki cyumweru kuri radio
title: Tuzumva Iki?
content:
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tuzumva ikiganiro twagiranye na Ciney. Uyu ni umuhanzikazi. Tuganira tuzibanda ku ndirimbe ye ya vuba yise “Igire, Woman Get Your Money” aho akangurira abakobwa kwigira bagashaka ayabo mafaranga.
 
Muri iki kiganiro azatubwira icyamuteye guhimba iyo ndirimbo.  Muri iki kiganiro kandi tuzabagezaho N’utuntu tw’ubwenge. Tuzakubwira ibintu bishishikaje cyangwa utari uzi ku mibereho y’inzuki.
 
Na ho kuwa Gatanu bwo, Divine ukora kuri sitasiyo ya lisansi azaduha ubuhamya bw’akazi akora, hamwe n’uburyo kamugiriye akamaro, ndetse n’uburyo abantu bamufata iyo bamusanze aho akorera.
 
Uwo munsi muri Tyaza Ubwenge na Ni Nyampinga tuzabaza tunasubize ibibazo bine, harimo n’iki: “Watubwira aho igihingwa cy’inanasi gikomoka?” Niba utahazi ntuzacikwe, ariko niba unahazi uzumva ibindi bibazo bisigaye.
 
Kuwa Gatandatu Ho murabizi ko umuziki uba ari mwinshi. Shangazi azasubiza ibibazo abakobwa n’abahungu bamubaza nk’uko mubimenyereye. Kimwe mu bibazo azasubiza ni icy’uwamubajijie ngo: “Ndi umukobwa mfite imyaka 17. Ese kugira amabere manini ufite imyaka mike biterwa n’iki?”
 
Hanyuma kandi, kuwa Gatandatu aba ari umwanya wahariwe kongera kumva ibiganiro byaranze icyumweru, hamwe n’ibibazo byose by’icyumeru byanyuze muri Tyaza Ubwenge na Ni Nyampinga.
 
Turabakunda cyane!


[Dore amasaha n'amaradio ikiganiro NN kinyuriraho][1]


  [1]: http://rw-gemrwanda.apollo.unicore.io/content/detail/003624ac1c74483caa3df8dc1b3f7aa4/
